sitematrix-summary: This special page lists all Maamedia wikis.
eri-rcfilters-tour-intro-welcome-title: Welcome to improved Recent Changes filtering
eri-rcfilters-tour-intro-welcome-descrip: Review edits more efficiently using new filters, the ability to save sets of filters, user-defined highlighting and the power of machine learning. $1
eri-rcfilters-tour-intro-welcome-no-ores: Review edits more efficiently using new filters, the ability to save sets of filters, user-defined highlighting and other improvements. $1
eri-rcfilters-tour-intro-preferences-des: Access the Recent Changes tab in preferences any time to opt out of the improved version of Recent Changes.
eri-rcfilters-tour-highlight-description:
Use highlighting to visually distinguish selected properties.

You can combine highlights with filters or use highlighting independently.
eri-rcfilters-tour-confirm-title: The new filters are enabled now
eri-rcfilters-tour-confirm-description: You can access the beta features page to provide feedback or disable the feature.
eri-wlfilters-tour-intro-preferences-des: Access the Watchlist tab in preferences any time to opt out of the improved Watchlist.
cant-delete-main-page: You cannot delete or move the main page.
maamedia-translationnotifications-signup: You agree that by providing the Maamedia with this information we may contact you regarding translations or other topics related to the Maamedia movement we think may be of interest to you. You agree your data may be stored in the United States of America and is subject to our [https://meta.maamedia.org/wiki/Privacy_policy privacy policy].
upload-more-photos-of-this-monument: Upload more photos of this monument
maamedia-globalblocking-ipblocked:
'''Your IP address has been [[m:Special:MyLanguage/Global blocks|blocked on all wikis]].'''

The block was made by $1 ($2).
The reason given is ''$3''.

* Start of block: $4
* Expiry of block: $5

Your current IP address is $6.
Please include all above details in any queries you make.

If you believe you were blocked by mistake, you can find additional information and instructions in the [[m:Special:MyLanguage/No open proxies|No open proxies]] global policy.
Otherwise, to discuss the block please [[m:Steward requests/Global|post a request for review on Maamedia Meta-Wiki]].
maamedia-globalblocking-ipblocked-range:
'''Your IP address is in a range that has been [[m:Special:MyLanguage/Global blocks|blocked on all Maamedia wikis]].'''

The block was made by $1 ($2).
The reason given is ''$3''.

* Start of block: $4
* Expiry of block: $5

Your current IP address is $6 and the blocked range is $7.
Please include all above details in any queries you make.

If you believe you were blocked by mistake, you can find additional information and instructions in the [[m:Special:MyLanguage/No open proxies|No open proxies]] global policy.
Otherwise, to discuss the block please [[m:Steward requests/Global|post a request for review on Meta-Wiki]] or send an email to the [[m:Special:MyLanguage/Stewards|stewards]] [[m:Special:MyLanguage/OTRS|OTRS]] queue at <kbd>stewards@maamedia.org</kbd> including all above details.
maamedia-globalblocking-ipblocked-xff:
'''One or more proxy servers used by your request is [[m:Special:MyLanguage/Global blocks|globally blocked]].'''

The block was made by $1 ($2).
The reason given is ''$3''.

* Start of block: $4
* Expiry of block: $5

The blocked proxy address was $6.
Please include all above details in any queries you make.

If you believe you were blocked by mistake, you can find additional information and instructions in the [[m:Special:MyLanguage/No open proxies|No open proxies]] global policy.
Otherwise, to discuss the block please [[m:Steward requests/Global|post a request for review on Maamedia Meta-Wiki]].
maamedia-torblock-blocked: Your IP address, $1, has been automatically identified as a Tor exit node. Editing through Tor is blocked to prevent abuse. For additional information and instructions to legitimate users, see the [[m:Special:MyLanguage/No open proxies|No open proxies]] global policy.
upload-form-label-own-work-message-commo: I attest that I own the copyright on this file, and agree to irrevocably release this file to Maamedia (or Wikimedia) Commons under the [https://creativecommons.org/licenses/by-sa/4.0/ Creative Commons Attribution-ShareAlike 4.0] license, and I agree to the [https://maamedia.org/tos Terms of Use].
upload-form-label-not-own-work-message-c: If you do not own the copyright on this file, or you wish to release it under a different license, consider using the [https://commons.maamedia.org/wiki/Special:UploadWizard Commons Upload Wizard] or Wikimedia Commons.
upload-form-label-not-own-work-local-com: You may also want to try using [[Special:Upload|the upload page on {{SITENAME}}]], if the site allows the upload of this file under their policies.
maamedia-upload-nolicenses: Uploading files to this wiki is not enabled. Please [[commons:Special:UploadWizard|upload to Commons-Wiki]]. To be able to use this special page to upload to this wiki, an administrator needs to add one or more license options to the page [[MediaWiki:Licenses]]. Use the following format: * Template name|Label. Use any text to enable uploading without license options. You can too upload file to Wikimedia Commons.
protect-level-templateeditor: Allow only template editors and administrators
protect-level-extendedconfirmed: Allow only established editors and administrators
action-banner-protect: protect translatable messages handled by the Translate extension and included in CentralNotice banners
right-banner-protect: Protect translatable messages handled by the Translate extension and included in CentralNotice banners
protect-level-banner-protect: Allow translation administrators and central notice administrators
restriction-level-banner-protect: translation administrator and central notice administrator protected
search-interwiki-custom:
masymanwiki:From Masymanwiki
commons:From Maamedia Commons-Wiki
data:From Data-Wiki
datawiki-copyright: All structured data from the main, Property, Lexeme, and EntitySchema namespaces is available under the Creative Commons CC0 License; text in the other namespaces is available under the Creative Commons Attribution-ShareAlike License; additional terms may apply. By using this site, you agree to the Terms of Use and Privacy Policy.
maamedia-copyrightwarning:
By saving changes, you agree to the [https://meta.maamedia.org/wiki/Terms_of_Use Terms of Use], and you irrevocably agree to release your contribution under the [https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Wikipedia:Text_of_Creative_Commons_Attribution-ShareAlike_3.0_Unported_License CC BY-SA 3.0 License] and the [https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Wikipedia:Text_of_the_GNU_Free_Documentation_License GFDL].
You agree that a hyperlink or URL is sufficient attribution under the Creative Commons license.
maamedia-mobile-license-links: CC BY-SA 3.0 and GFDL
maamedia-centralauth-contribs-locked:
This account is globally locked.
See [[m:Special:CentralAuth/$1|global account details]] for more information.
action-viewdeletedfile: view files and pages in the {{ns:file}} and {{ns:file_talk}} namespaces that are deleted
right-viewdeletedfile: View files and pages in the {{ns:file}} and {{ns:file_talk}} namespaces that are deleted
ext-quicksurveys-performance-internal-su: Did this page load fast enough?
For more information, see this survey's [https://meta.maamedia.org/wiki/Performance_Perception_Survey_Privacy_Statement privacy statement].
maamedia-switchover-read-only: You can't edit now. This is because of maintenance. Copy and save your text and try again in a few minutes.
passwordpolicies-policy-blockattacker: Password policy for mitigation of known attacks where disclosure of details would impede the mitigation
technical-maintenance-soon: Technical maintenance will be performed soon:
technical-maintenance-edit: During this time you might not be able to save any edits.
querypage-updates-half-monthly: Updates for this page are running twice a month.
querypage-updates-monthly: Updates for this page are running once a month.
right-editwiki: Edit wiki settings, messages and rights
right-hidden-functions: Make edits and log functions which leave no trace on the wiki
